name: Jump Slime Jump!
description:
This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1

The theme was: Holes.

(The game may be a bit laggy in chrome, but works fine in every other browser)

A platforming game where you as a Slime got trapped in a well, now you have to escape before the water level rises!

Controls: Space Bar - Jump

The Team: 

- AlexAuragan: Coding-music.

- JdR2V: Design.

- linkybappo: Coding.

- LiLmeechxD - Coding.

- Naggi: Art.
